sem:triple.sem:subject: /en/travis_mayweather
sem:triple.sem:object: Travis Mayweather is a fictional character, portrayed by Anthony Montgomery, in the television series Star Trek: Enterprise, serving as a navigator and helm officer aboard the starship Enterprise. He holds the rank of Ensign, and is in the command division. Mayweather is one of the main characters throughout the show's entire four-season run.

resource.name: Travis Mayweather
resource.description: Travis Mayweather is a fictional character, portrayed by Anthony Montgomery, in the television series Star Trek: Enterprise, serving as a navigator and helm officer aboard the starship Enterprise. He holds the rank of Ensign, and is in the command division. Mayweather is one of the main characters throughout the show's entire four-season run.
